resources.string: Taste involves 20 of the city\’s best restaurants all ranging in taste, style and atmosphere. Whether you\’re looking for a family meal or a romantic night out with that special someone, we\’re confident you\’l find a restaurant for your occasion.

Taste of Dubai boasts some of the country\'s finest chefs on stage at the Chef\'s Theatre and Cookery School. They\'ll help refine that ambitious menu and prepare you for the ultimate season of extravagance. Check up our line up for 2015
